title: Susanna Reid compared to Disney princess as she shares stunning school photo
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Susanna Reid has shared her official school photo – and it’s so much better than ours.

During the latest instalment of Good Morning Britain, the 48-year-old was discussing the news that one school offered airbrushing for portraits, when the hosts shared their own throwbacks.

School pictures of Adil Ray, Laura Tobin and Richard Arnold flashed across the screen, coupled with a retouched version for good measure.

And Susanna left squirming as she tried to avoid the embarrassment, before her photo was splashed on air.

Advertisement

Advertisement

She could be seen posing in a grey polo shirt, with a slightly shorter, curlier hairdo than we’re used to seeing her with.

Seriously, how has she even managed to make school photos look amazing?

Susanna Reid showed off her school photo (L) alongside a retouched version (Picture: ITV)

Piers Morgan’s pal had absolutely nothing to worry about as Richard compared her to a Hollywood legend in the snap.

‘You always remind me of Andie McDowell,’ he replied.

‘Good hair I think, actually,’ she agreed. ‘Apparently the re-touchers decided I needed a full-face of make-up.

‘I’ve got a rosy tint to my lip there and I think they may have even plucked my eyebrows.

Fans were shocked at her snap (Picture: PA)

‘I’m going to have to find that photo and burn it, I definitely don’t want that on there ever again. What a shocker.’

Susanna’s fans were left shocked at how fabulous she managed to look in her photo.

‘Susanna back then you looked stunning and you look even more stunning now, you truly do,’ one tweeted.

‘It’s always great to look back at those school photos, I still have a few of mine many years ago.’

‘She looks like a cartoon figure, I’m thinking about snow white,’ another replied.

Advertisement

Advertisement

While a follower added: ‘Always gorgeous.’

Good Morning Britain continues on weekdays, at 6am, on ITV.

description: Susanna Reid has shared her official school photo. During the latest instalment of Good Morning Britain, the 48-year-old aired her snap
